God damnit I could orgasm, Nintendo fucking has good online, and it's with an amazing game!

topics.body:
I didn't play Splatoon, but if you gave me a chance to play it, I'd go in paintguns blazing.

That demo was one hell of an hour worth wasting just watching EHAN play. I don't even know if I can handle the beauty of this game, or get gud enough to bring the pain onto the battlefield.

Splatoon was a genius idea. Now all it needs to do is sell a sh*tload of copies.

If it does? BOOM, instant franchise!
